lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Exchange rate uncertainties continued to have a major impact on the currency composition of new bonds.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Activity on the straight bond market was also less buoyant than in previous months while equity-related offerings continued to benefit from the good performance of major stock markets.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Borrowing on the international capital markets contracted significantly in March with 23.1 billion dlrs of medium and long-term funds raised, down 3.4 billion from February and about nine billion dlrs less than in March 1986, the Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development said in its latest monthly report.
